videos.headline: Alabama strikes first with easy TD
videos.description: Jalen Hurts finds Irv Smith Jr. wide open for an 8-yard touchdown to give Alabama an early lead over Mercer.

videos.headline: Crimson Tide's Harris waltzes in for TD
videos.description: Alabama's Najee Harris takes the hand off and walks in for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Alabama's Hurts finds Ridley for 66-yard TD pass
videos.description: Calvin Ridley is wide open for the catch, and Jalen Hurts finds him for a Crimson Tide touchdown.

videos.headline: Mercer throws interception
videos.description: Bears' Kaelan Riley pass is intercepted by Crimson Tide's Hootie Jones for a turnover.

videos.headline: Crimson Tide quickly score after interception
videos.description: After Hootie Jones picks off the Bears, Josh Jacobs takes the shovel pass and runs the ball in for a 7-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Alabama's Scarbrough scampers for 44 yards to the redzone
videos.description: Bo Scarbrough dodges tacklers and runs for 44 yards putting the Crimson Tide in scoring position.

videos.headline: Crimson Tide strikes again with another easy TD
videos.description: Alabama's Tua Tagovailoa fakes a hand off and finds Hale Hentges for a 4-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Mercer's Poole forces Alabama fumble
videos.description: Crimson Tide's Henry Ruggs III fumbles the ball forced by Bears' Harrison Poole, and recovered by Mercr Sidney Otiwu. This is Mercers' 6th takeaway against a SEC school this season.

videos.headline: Saban discusses Senior Day and Moses' first start
videos.description: Nick Saban talks about what Senior Day means to him, and breaks down Dylan Moses' first career start at inside linebacker.

videos.headline: Alabama's Sims with impressive TD catch
videos.description: Crimson Tide's Tua Tagovailoa finds Cam Sims in the end zone, who stretches for the catch and manages to keep a foot in bounds for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Alabama grabs tipped pass for another turnover
videos.description: Bears' Kaelan Riley throws another interception, caught by Deionte Thompson and returns the ball for 21 yards putting Alabama in scoring position.

videos.headline: Alabama extends lead with Robinson TD
videos.description: Brian Robinson Jr scores another easy touchdown for the Crimson Tide.

videos.headline: Diving TD catch by Crimson Tide's Kief
videos.description: Tua Tagovailoa finds Derek Kief deep in the end zone who leaps for the catch for another Alabama touchdown.

videos.headline: Saban describes what the Iron Bowl means to him
videos.description: Nick Saban discusses what he learned about his Alabama team from today's 56-0 win over Mercer and the build up for next week's Iron Bowl.

videos.headline: Alabama's Hurts discusses blowout
videos.description: Jalen Hurts breaks down the Crimson Tide's performance, offense, and the Iron Bowl next week.

videos.headline: Moses' performance, Iron Bowl preview
videos.description: Jordan Rodgers and Tom Hart break down Dylan Moses' performance and gives a preview of what is to come in next week's Iron Bowl.

videos.headline: Alabama blanks Mercer to remain undefeated
videos.description: Jalen Hurts throws three touchdown passes as top-ranked Alabama improves to 11-0 with a 56-0 win over Mercer.
